正方(發帖時忘了選= =)

say really
I' can't contrast
because thoes two are not same nature
but I will choose wood ,because:
wood can make:
wooden plank,door,crafting table,chest,sign,bookshelf,noteblock,rails,lever,
torch,stairs,fence,ladder,jukebox,bed,pressure plate,bowl,axe,hoe,pickaxe,shovel,fishing rod,
mushroom stew,sword,arrow,bow,boat,painting,charcoal and storage minecart.

but good just can make:
axe,hoe,pickaxe,shovel,sword,boots,chestplate,helmet,leggings,clocks,golden apple and golden block

this is why I choose wood

replies.txt_content:
实用性差太多了啊～～根本没得比～～

没有木头就没法做基本工具及火把，那么连生存都会有问题

黄金则可有可无，做成工具还不如钻石好用
